aboutMe: I make a lot of art. I don't know what to do with all of it and I want to do something to help my community. So I decided to sell it and move the proceeds into local charities and programs to help Saint John grow.
aboutMe2: I sell art to make money for charity. I want to make an impact. That's it. Also I need a job and until I can get one, this is what I will be doing to pass the time.
